channel.title: low carb on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in low carb on Recipes

item.title: Curried Cauliflower Soup
item.description: Full of flavor and can be adapted to a vegan dish. Prep Cook Serves 30 min 15 min 4-6 Ingredients 1/2 cup raw cashews 3/4 cup water 2 tsp coconut oil 1 large onion, diced 1 large cauliflower head, cut into 1 inch pieces 1 can coconut milk 3 tbsp curry powder 1 tsp ground turmeric 1 tsp ground cumin 1 tsp sugar 1/4 tsp ground cinnamoon salt to taste (optional, bacon bits for decoration, heavy cream, 1 yellow potato) Steps Put the cashews in a blender and blend on high until finely ground.

item.title: Mouse Au Chocolate
item.description: Super quick and sugar free chocolate mousse. Prep Chill Serves 10 min 30 min 4-6 Ingredients 1.5 cup heavy whipping cream 4 tbps heavy whipping cream 1/4 cup cocoa powder 25 g 100% cocoa baking chocolate 2 tbsp sweetener, I like purevia dark chocolate chunks, or dark baking chocolate in slivers for decoration Steps Whip heavy cream until fully thinkened and then add sweetener, vanilla and cocoa.

item.title: Chocolate Cake (Low Carb)
item.description: Super easy low carb chocolate cake, ideal as basis for black forest cake and other layer cakes. Prep Bake Serves 10 min 15-20 min 1 8x12 pan Ingredients 1/3 cup milk 3 eggs 1 tbsp Vanilla extract 1.5 cups almond flour 0.5 cup coconut flour 1/4 cup cocoa powder 1 pinch salt 1/3 cup granulated sugar substitute 2.

item.title: Plum Cake (Low Carb)
item.description: Low carb version of plum cobbler. Prep Bake Serves 30 min 25-30 min 1 8x12 pan Ingredients 1/2 stick butter, softened 3/4 cup milk 3 egg 1 tbsp Vanilla extract 1 tsp Almond extract 1.5 cups almond flour 0.5 cup coconut flour 1/4 tsp xantam gum 1 pinch salt 1/2 cup granulated sugar substitute 2 tsp baking poweder 20-25 plums (depending on size, I used italian prunes in recipe) 1 cup slivered almonds (or chopped) Steps Mix very soft butter with sweetener, until smooth.
